# Business Context (for LLM understanding)

## About Poligem
Poligem is a business in the diamonds and jewelry industry.

## Target Audience
- Luxury Jewelry Retailers
- Custom Jewelry Designers
- High-Net-Worth Individuals

## Industry
diamonds and jewelry
